code: const valid=_ref=>{let{fullname,username,email,password,cf_password}=_ref;const err={};if(!fullname){err.fullname="Please add full name.";}else if(fullname.length>25){err.fullname="Full name must be smaller than 25 characters.";}if(!username){err.username="Please add User name.";}else if(username.replace(/ /g,'').length>25){err.username="User name must be smaller than 25 characters.";}if(!email){err.email="Please add Email.";}if(!password){err.password="Please add Password.";}else if(password.length<6){err.password="Password must be al least 6 characters long.";}if(password!==cf_password){err.cf_password="Password does not match.";}return{errMsg:err,errLength:Object.keys(err).length};};export default valid;
